BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-DMS
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Save molecular surfaces in Dot Molecular Surface (DMS) format
BundleInfo.Description: DMS was originally developed for the MS (Molecular Surface) program by Michael Connolly to represent molecular surfaces. The DMS file format stores atomic and surface point information, typically used in molecular modeling and docking applications. DMS files represent solvent-accessible molecular surfaces (SAS) or solvent-excluded surfaces (SES) for molecular interactions, docking, and structure-based drug design.
